text: Peter the Great () is a 1937 Soviet drama movie directed by Vladimir Petrov.Первая победа России в Северной войне и новый Иван Сусанин It stars Nikolai Simonov, Mikhail Zharov, and Nikolay Cherkasov. == Actors == * Nikolai Simonov as Tsar Pyotr I * Mikhail Zharov as Alexander Danilovich Menshikov * Nikolay Cherkasov as Prince Alexei * Mikhail Tarkhanov as Field Marshal Boris Sheremetev * Viktor Dobrovolsky as Yaguzhinsky, an officer / Fedka, a debtor == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1937 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies about royalty Category:Movies set in Saint Petersburg Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies set in the 17th century Category:Movies set in the 18th century Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Petrov
title: Peter the Great (1937 movie)
